Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    cucumber.api.TestStep.definitionMatch
    not part of the public api
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    cucumber.api.junit.Cucumber.createRuntime(ResourceLoader, ClassLoader, RuntimeOptions)
    Neither the runtime nor the backend or any of the classes involved in their construction are part of the public API. As such they should not be exposed. The recommended way to observe the cucumber process is to listen to events by using a plugin. For example the JSONFormatter.
    cucumber.api.TestStep.executeStep(String, Scenario, boolean)
    cucumber.api.TestStep.nonExceptionStatus(boolean)
    cucumber.api.TestCase.run(EventBus)
    not part of the public api
    cucumber.api.TestStep.run(EventBus, String, Scenario, boolean)
    not part of the public api
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    cucumber.api.TestCase(List<TestStep>, PickleEvent)
    not part of the public api
    cucumber.api.TestCase(List<TestStep>, PickleEvent, boolean)
    not part of the public api
    cucumber.api.TestStep(DefinitionMatch)
    not part of the public api
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements 
    Annotation Type Element and Description
    cucumber.api.CucumberOptions.format
    use CucumberOptions.plugin()
